show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 188 Connie Bowen – Instead of replacing farmworkers, let’s design agtech to help the ones doing the back breaking work in the field
subtitle: 188 Connie Bowen – Instead of replacing farmworkers, let’s design agtech to help the ones doing the back breaking work in the field
summary:
A conversation with Connie Bowen, co-founder of Farmhand Ventures, a venture studio redesigning the future of work in agriculture, about the labour issue and building collaborative automation agtech.
